hotels.title: UK: Elegant Hampshire Manor House Luxury with Country Club & Spa
hotels.description: Enter a world of old-school opulence with a stay at this ivy-clad 18th-century country estate on England's southern coast. Set on 130 acres of crisp green Hampshire countryside, the five-star Chewton Glen Hotel & Spa offers the perfect combination of rural charm and modern luxury. Reset your natural rhythms with a treatment at the acclaimed Chewton Glen Spa, then unwind in the hydrotherapy pool, sauna or steam room. Take advantage of the hotel's sprawling grounds with a game of golf, before indulging in English fine dining at The Dining Room, or fresh farm-to-table fare at the Kitchen, run by celebrity chef James Martin.

hotels.title: Hampshire Country Resort with Two Indoor Swimming Pools
hotels.description: Prepare to be delighted by the wonders of Basingstoke and beyond with a relaxing stay at Hampshire Court Hotel & Spa. Steeped in rich heritage, this charming corner of England will delight history lovers, architecture enthusiasts and gourmands alike, as well as those seeking a tranquil country atmosphere. Within close reach, you'll find Leisure Park, Milestones Museum, Whitchurch Silk Mill, and further afield Stratfield Saye House offers a fascinating insight into the life of the Great Duke of Wellington. Exceptional onsite facilities include 90 comfortable rooms, a tranquil spa for well-deserved pampering, a state-of-the-art renovated gym, five tennis courts, and two indoor swimming pools. Don't miss The Hampshire Restaurant with its innovative menu complemented by an exceptional wine list.
